column3: Vegetables 2019 Summary: Released February 13, 2020, by the National Agricultural Statistics Service (NASS), Agricultural Statistics Board, United States Department of Agriculture (USDA).
Chile Peppers for Fresh Market and Processing Area Planted and Harvested, Yield, Production, Price, and Value – States and United States: 2017-2019
